3 #Forms Form elements

Basic form elements and layouts for a consistent editing experience

Source: document/forms.less, line 1

3.1 #Forms.Button Button basics

All buttons automatically inherit the following states:

  • normal -- default
  • hover -- :hover
  • active -- :active
  • focus -- :focus
  • disabled -- arbitrary class

Each button type inherits these states, no special CSS handling is required.

Source: documented-components/buttons.less, line 26

3.1.11 #Forms.Button.Sizes Button sizes

Toggle full screen Open in new window Toggle example guides Toggle HTML markup 

.EXAMPLE_BUTTON_LARGE {
  .button-danger()
  .button-large();
}

.EXAMPLE_BUTTON_DEFAULT {
  .button();
}

.EXAMPLE_BUTTON_SMALL {
  .button-success();
  .button-small();
}

.EXAMPLE_BUTTON_MINI {
  .button-primary();
  .button-mini();
}
Example
Large button Regular button
Small button
Markup: documented-components/hbs/button-sizes.hbs 
<ELEMENT class="EXAMPLE_BUTTON_LARGE">Large button</ELEMENT>
<a class="EXAMPLE_BUTTON_DEFAULT">Regular button</a>
<div class="EXAMPLE_BUTTON_SMALL">Small button</div>
<input type="button" value="Mini button" class="EXAMPLE_BUTTON_MINI">

3.1.12 #Forms.Button.Groups Button groups

Toggle full screen Open in new window Toggle example guides Toggle HTML markup 

.EXAMPLE_BUTTON_GROUP_1 {
  .button-group();
}

.EXAMPLE_BUTTON_GROUP_2 {
  .button-group(a);
}
Example
left middle right
Markup: documented-components/hbs/button-group.hbs 
<section class="display-flex">

    <ELEMENT class="EXAMPLE_BUTTON_GROUP_1">
        <BUTTON class="EXAMPLE_BUTTON_BASE">1</BUTTON>
        <BUTTON class="EXAMPLE_BUTTON_BASE">2</BUTTON>
        <BUTTON class="EXAMPLE_BUTTON_BASE">3</BUTTON>
        <BUTTON class="EXAMPLE_BUTTON_BASE">4</BUTTON>
        <BUTTON class="EXAMPLE_BUTTON_BASE">5</BUTTON>
    </ELEMENT>

    <ELEMENT class="EXAMPLE_BUTTON_GROUP_2">
        <a class="EXAMPLE_BUTTON_SECONDARY">left</a>
        <a class="EXAMPLE_BUTTON_SECONDARY">middle</a>
        <a class="EXAMPLE_BUTTON_SECONDARY">right</a>
    </ELEMENT>

</section>

3.1.13 #Forms.Button.Dropdowns Buttons dropdowns

Toggle full screen Open in new window Toggle example guides Toggle HTML markup 

.EXAMPLE_BUTTON_DROPDOWN_1 {
  .button-group-dropdown(span; a; ~".open");
  display: inline-block;

  .DROPDOWN_CARET_ICON {
    .getFaIcon('caret-down');
  }
}

.EXAMPLE_BUTTON_DROPDOWN_2 {
  .button-group-dropdown(ul; li; ~".SHOW_MENU");
  display: inline-block;

  .DROPDOWN_CARET_ICON {
    .getFaIcon('caret-down');
  }
}

.EXAMPLE_BUTTON_DROPDOWN_3 {
  .button-group-dropdown(~"span#EXAMPLE_MENU_3"; ~"span.MENU-ITEM"; ~".MENU_VISIBLE");
  display: inline-block;
}

.EXAMPLE_DROPDOWN_ITEM_DIVIDER {
  .button-group-dropdown-menu-divider();
}

.EXAMPLE_GROUP_SOME_BUTTONS {
  .button-group();
}

.EXAMPLE_DROPDOWN_ITEM {
  .button-group-dropdown-menu-item();
}

.EXAMPLE_BUTTON_DROPDOWN_MENU_STAND_ALONE {
  .button-group-dropdown-menu-appearance();

  li a {
    .button-group-dropdown-menu-item();
  }
}
Example
Action Action 1 Action 2
Action
  • Action 1
  • Action 2
  • Action 3
  • Action 4 with very very very very very long text
Menu Dropdown
Action 1 Action 3
Action 3 Action 4 with very very very very very long text
  • Action 1
  • Action 2
  • Action 3 with a very long menu item text with a very long menu item text
    Action 1
    Action 2
    Another Action Group 1 Another Action Group 2 with a very long menu item text
Markup: documented-components/hbs/button-dropdown.hbs 
<section class="display-flex">

    <div class="EXAMPLE_BUTTON_DROPDOWN_1 EXAMPLE_BUTTON_DROPDOWN_WITH_DYNAMIC_DEMO_11">
        <a class="EXAMPLE_BUTTON_BASE" onclick="toggleClass(`EXAMPLE_BUTTON_DROPDOWN_WITH_DYNAMIC_DEMO_11`, `open`)">Action <element class="DROPDOWN_CARET_ICON"></element></a>
        <span>
            <a>Action 1</a>
            <a>Action 2</a>
        </span>
    </div>

    <div class="EXAMPLE_BUTTON_DROPDOWN_2 EXAMPLE_BUTTON_DROPDOWN_WITH_DYNAMIC_DEMO_2">
        <div class="EXAMPLE_GROUP_SOME_BUTTONS">
            <a class="EXAMPLE_BUTTON_PRIMARY">Action</a>
            <a class="EXAMPLE_BUTTON_PRIMARY" onclick="toggleClass(`EXAMPLE_BUTTON_DROPDOWN_WITH_DYNAMIC_DEMO_2`, `SHOW_MENU`)"> <span class="DROPDOWN_CARET_ICON"></span></a>
        </div>
        <ul>
            <li><a>Action 1</a></li>
            <li><a>Action 2</a></li>
            <hr class="EXAMPLE_DROPDOWN_ITEM_DIVIDER">
            <li><a>Action 3</a></li>
            <li><a>Action 4 with very very very very very long text</a></li>
        </ul>
    </div>

    <div class="EXAMPLE_BUTTON_DROPDOWN_3 EXAMPLE_BUTTON_DROPDOWN_WITH_DYNAMIC_DEMO_3">
        <div class="EXAMPLE_GROUP_SOME_BUTTONS">
            <a class="EXAMPLE_BUTTON_SECONDARY">Menu</a>
            <a class="EXAMPLE_BUTTON_SECONDARY" onclick="toggleClass(`EXAMPLE_BUTTON_DROPDOWN_WITH_DYNAMIC_DEMO_3`, `MENU_VISIBLE`)"><span>Dropdown</span></a>
        </div>
        <span id="EXAMPLE_MENU_3">
            <span class="MENU-ITEM"><a>Action 1</a></span>
            <span class="MENU-ITEM"><a>Action 3</a></span>
            <hr class="EXAMPLE_DROPDOWN_ITEM_DIVIDER">
            <span class="MENU-ITEM"><a>Action 3</a></span>
            <span class="MENU-ITEM"><a>Action 4 with very very very very very long text</a></span>
        </span>
    </div>
    
    <ul class="EXAMPLE_BUTTON_DROPDOWN_MENU_STAND_ALONE">
        <li><a>Action 1</a></li>
        <li><a>Action 2</a></li>
        <li><a>Action 3 with a very long menu item text with a very long menu item text</a></li>
    </ul>

    <ul class="EXAMPLE_BUTTON_DROPDOWN_MENU_STAND_ALONE">
        <div class="EXAMPLE_DROPDOWN_ITEM">Action 1</div>
        <div class="EXAMPLE_DROPDOWN_ITEM">Action 2</div>
        <section class="EXAMPLE_DROPDOWN_ITEM_DIVIDER"></section>
        <span class="EXAMPLE_DROPDOWN_ITEM">Another Action Group 1</span>
        <span class="EXAMPLE_DROPDOWN_ITEM">Another Action Group 2 with a very long menu item text</span>
    </ul>

</section>
Source: documented-components/buttons.less, line 497

3.1.14 #Forms.Button.Misc Miscellaneous

Toggle full screen Open in new window Toggle example guides Toggle HTML markup 

.EXAMPLE_BUTTON_SECONDARY {
  .ICON_BOOK {
    .getFaIcon('book');
  }
}

.EXAMPLE_BUTTON_GROUP_1abc {
  .button-group();
  .ICON_ALIGN_LEFT { .getFaIcon('align-left'); }
  .ICON_ALIGN_CENTER { .getFaIcon('align-center'); }
  .ICON_ALIGN_RIGTH { .getFaIcon('align-right'); }
  .ICON_ALIGN_JUSTIFY { .getFaIcon('align-justify'); }
}

.EXAMPLE_BUTTON_DROPDOWN_3 {
  .EXAMPLE_GROUP_SOME_BUTTONS {
    .ICON_AVATAR {
      .getFaIcon('user');
    }

    .ICON_CARET_DOWN {display: none;
      .getFaIcon('caret-down');
    }
  }
}

.EXAMPLE_BUTTON_SECONDARY {
  .FA_ANIMATED_SPINNER {
    .getFaIcon('spinner');
    .fa-anim('spin', 'FA_ANIMATE_SPINNER');
  }
}

.EXAMPLE_BUTTON_DANGER {
  .FA_ICON_SYNC {
    .getFaIcon('sync');
    .fa-anim('spin', 'SYNC_ICON_ANIM');
  }

  .LOADING_WIDGET_HERE {
    .loading('Wait for synchronizing to complete', @white);
  }
}

.EXAMPLE_BUTTON_CUBE {
  .button();

  .MY_SUGAR_LOGO {
    .sugar-cube('default');
  }

  .FONT_AWESOME_SPIN {
    .fa-anim('spin', 'FA_ANIMATE_SUGAR_CUBE');
  }

  svg {
    height: 10px;
  }
}
Example
Label
Action
Waiting... Stand by...
Markup: documented-components/hbs/button-misc.hbs 
<section class="display-flex">
    <ELEMENT class="EXAMPLE_BUTTON_SECONDARY"><i class="ICON_BOOK"></i> Label</ELEMENT>

    <ELEMENT class="EXAMPLE_BUTTON_GROUP_1abc">
        <BUTTON class="EXAMPLE_BUTTON_BASE"><i class="ICON_ALIGN_LEFT"></i></BUTTON>
        <BUTTON class="EXAMPLE_BUTTON_BASE"><i class="ICON_ALIGN_CENTER"></i></BUTTON>
        <BUTTON class="EXAMPLE_BUTTON_BASE"><i class="ICON_ALIGN_RIGTH"></i></BUTTON>
        <BUTTON class="EXAMPLE_BUTTON_BASE"><i class="ICON_ALIGN_JUSTIFY"></i></BUTTON>
    </ELEMENT>

    <div class="EXAMPLE_BUTTON_DROPDOWN_3 EXAMPLE_BUTTON_DROPDOWN_WITH_DYNAMIC_DEMO_2">
        <div class="EXAMPLE_GROUP_SOME_BUTTONS">
            <a class="EXAMPLE_BUTTON_PRIMARY"><i class="ICON_AVATAR"></i> Action</a>
            <a class="EXAMPLE_BUTTON_PRIMARY"><span><i class="ICON_CARET_DOWN"></i></span></a>
        </div>
    </div>

    <ELEMENT class="EXAMPLE_BUTTON_SECONDARY"><i class="FA_ANIMATED_SPINNER"></i> Waiting...</ELEMENT>

    <ELEMENT class="EXAMPLE_BUTTON_DANGER"><i class="FA_ICON_SYNC"></i>
        <ELEMENT class="LOADING_WIDGET_HERE"><!--
            --><i></i><i></i><i></i>
        </ELEMENT>
    </ELEMENT>

    <ELEMENT class="EXAMPLE_BUTTON_CUBE">
        <span class="MY_SUGAR_LOGO FONT_AWESOME_SPIN"></span>
        Stand by...
    </ELEMENT>
</section>
Source: documented-components/buttons.less, line 650
